fr-FR.summary: Try to find a song title according lyrics given by the user
examplePhrases: Trouve moi le titre de tu continues à danser
C'est quoi le titre de ramenez la coupe à la maison
Le top du genre du trap
fr-FR.name: inMyHead
fr-FR.description:
First the user needs to say "Salut" to start the conversation with the application. Then he can either give some lyrics to find out a song title or get the top song of a music category (like rap or pop).
No requirement, but even if it's a related to music the application do not support singing, the instruction needs to be as clear as possible. 
Anynone can use the application and nothing will be stored after Alexa shut the conversation.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Sample Testing Instructions.
Say: "Salut toi"
Then say: "Trouve moi le titre de ramenez la coupe à la maison"
If the song isn't the one you wanted to find say: "Non" it will find another song with the same lyrics 
Otherwise say "Oui"

If you want the top song of a category just say: "Le top du genre trap" it will give you a song that is in the top songs of the category
